meanings.sent1: My yaar and I always go on adventures together.
meanings.sent2: I met my yaar in school, and we've been friends ever since.
meanings.sent3: When my yaar and I get together, we always end up laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: She is my rock, my yaar who always supports me through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: My yaar is like a sibling to me, always there when I need them.

meanings.definition: Used to address or refer to a friend.
meanings.sent1: Yaar, let's grab a bite to eat after class.
meanings.sent3: Yaar, you won't believe what happened to me today!
meanings.sent4: In times of trouble, yaar, is the one you can count on.
meanings.sent5: Yaar, you're the best friend a person could ask for.
